section.title: Why Simulate Hydrographs?
section.para: Discuss the need to simulate hydrographs, the importance of characterising both peak and volume, the advantages of using rainfall frequency curves to extrapolate flood frequency relationships. Introduce the need for probability-neutral transformation of rainfall to runoff, and the relationship between this Book and the guidance provided in Books 5, 6 and 7.

section.title: Scope
section.para: Outline the focus on catchment processes relevant to flood generation, event-based simulation (simple event, ensemble event, and Monte Carlo approaches), and continuous simulation, followed by the general treatment of joint probability for event-based and continuous simulation approaches, and the characterisation of uncertainty.
